message: I'd like to personally thank the person from Disney giving out the Pascal Plushes.  Since coming back from PyCon, my 4 year old LOVES her little Pascal, and will not go to bed without him.
I guess that was Paul Hildebrandt @paulhildebrandt
It was my pleasure.  I am so glad she enjoyed it.  :-)
@paulhildebrandt ditto from my 2.5 year old.  Just saw Tangled tonight and she's even more excited.
Yeah ditto, thanks Paul! We've had fun with mine around the house, now we're making a gift of it to my neice. Much appreciated!
Yep. Thanks! They are totally sweet. =)
